participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable, enjoys engaging in community activities.
participant_1.background: I live in Celebration, Florida. I enjoy shopping. I used to cheerlead in high school. I am married and have 2 kids.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Stressed but resilient, values family support and enjoys letting loose when he can.
participant_2.background: I work over 60 hours a week as a restaurant manager. I despise my boss. When I cut loose, I lose control. We help each other out in my family. I lived most of my life not knowing who Bob Marley was.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I'm a restaurant manager, but I work long hours and I hate my boss.
Oh, that's too bad. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go shopping and I used to cheerlead in high school.
That's cool! I'm not much of a shopper, but I used to play softball in high school.
Oh, that's awesome! I've always wanted to play softball.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
So, what's your favorite thing to do in Celebration?
I like to go to the park with my kids.
That's nice. I like to go to the park too, but I don't have any kids.
Oh, well you're welcome to join us sometime.
Thanks, I might take you up on that.
Cool. We're usually there on Saturdays.
